alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:23AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southeastern Walton and southern Washington Counties through NOON EDT/1100 AM CDT/... At 1122 AM EDT/1022 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Ebro, Portland, Seminole Hills, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Sunnyside, Porter Lake, Bunker, Grayton Beach, West Bay, Inlet Beach, Port Washington, Greenhead, Bruce, Red Head and Pine Log. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
